caption:
This photograph depicts a tranquil and scenic landscape centered around a large body of calm blue water, possibly a lake or river. Dominating the right side of the image is a tall, red and white electricity transmission tower. The tower extends into the clear, sky-blue background, and several power lines emanate from its top, stretching across the frame. The landscape around the tower subsides into flat, low-lying terrain densely populated with small, brushy trees and shrubbery marking the waterâ€™s edge.

On the horizon, the sky is vivid and clear, showcasing various gradations of blue, and adorned with a contrail from an airplane, indicating a subtle hint of human activity that contrasts with the otherwise natural setting. The overall composition, with its open skies and reflective waters, offers a serene sense of spaciousness and the peace often found in undisturbed natural environments.
title: High voltage utility line crosses the Bayou Segnette waterway approximately 10 miles south of the Westwego public boat launch.
